li.a: Talking to Kids About the Coronavirus
Fine Arts in Bradley County Schools

div.div: The mission of the Bradley County School System is to provide an educational opportunity for every student to excel.

By inspiring excellence, all students will realize their worth and potential. By inspiring excellence in learning, all students will be college and career ready. By providing an academically rigorous and relevant education, all students will excel. By becoming a leader, all students will develop character and confidence.

article.aria-label: MEMORIAL DAY-Central Office and School Offices closed

h3.a: MEMORIAL DAY-Central Office and School Offices closed
Bradley County High Schools will hold Graduation Ceremonies in June

div.div: Due to the continued health concerns and social distancing measures, Bradley County schools will hold graduation ceremonies on the previously announced June Dates. All respective schools will communicate specific details with students and families.

Throughout the coming weeks, "I've been tagged" signs can be spotted throughout the community. BCS is grateful for the strong community partners that continue to support our system and share hope. We would like to provide a small token of gratitude. #BetterTogether #sharinghope

Gandhi once said, “Be the change that you wish to see in the world.” Bradley County Administrators challenge you to “Be the Change” during these unpredictable times! #BetterTogether #LearningInPlaceTN
Bradley County Schools has created Public WIFI access areas at all elementary schools in the district.
Bradley County Schools and Cleveland City Schools will follow the Governor's Recommendation to close schools for the remainder of the academic year.

Registration Resource Page is now available for Bradley County Schools. Registration Resource page links will help you get the process started. If you need any help with the process, please call 423-476-0620 or email reghelp@bradleyschools.org.
